body_html: @karol-arndt the MAGMA based inverse is MUCH faster than the cublas version for many sizes and overall has a better performance profile (as can be attested to by @martinarjovsky who's been reporting this). If it's not too much of an ask, porting the magma bindings would be good as well.
body_text: @karol-arndt the MAGMA based inverse is MUCH faster than the cublas version for many sizes and overall has a better performance profile (as can be attested to by @martinarjovsky who's been reporting this). If it's not too much of an ask, porting the magma bindings would be good as well.
body: @karol-arndt the MAGMA based inverse is MUCH faster than the cublas version for many sizes and overall has a better performance profile (as can be attested to by @martinarjovsky who's been reporting this). If it's not too much of an ask, porting the magma bindings would be good as well.
